metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude skills for development workflows

plugins.name: all-skills
plugins.description: Meta-plugin that installs all available skills from all plugins

plugins.name: claude-code
plugins.description: Claude Code-specific skills: plugin marketplace management and validation

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Essential development skills: Git, documentation, code review, accessibility, security

plugins.name: dagu
plugins.description: Dagu workflow orchestration: workflows, web UI, REST API

plugins.name: elixir
plugins.description: Elixir development skills: Phoenix, OTP, Tidewave MCP, testing, configuration

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: GitHub Actions, Workflows, and act local testing tool

plugins.name: rust
plugins.description: Rust programming skills: ownership, borrowing, async, best practices

plugins.name: slidev
plugins.description: Slidev presentation skills: markdown slides, syntax, code blocks, export, and troubleshooting

plugins.name: ui
plugins.description: UI framework skills: daisyUI components and theming

plugins.name: wasm
plugins.description: WebAssembly skills: wasmtime runtime, component model, guest compilation, and host embedding

plugins.name: zig
plugins.description: Zig programming skills: build system, comptime, allocators, error handling, C interop, testing, and troubleshooting

plugins.name: claudio
plugins.description: Comprehensive project analysis and planning system with parallel discovery agents
